author: Overnight.fi
title: Overnight.fi
shortDescription: Overnight.fi is an asset management protocol offering passive yield products based on delta-neutral strategies for conservative liquidity miners.
description: Overnight.fi is an asset management protocol offering passive yield products based on delta-neutral strategies for conservative liquidity miners.

author: Velodrome
title: Velodrome
shortDescription: Velodrome is an AMM modeled on Solidly and designed to be a public good that provides deep liquidity and low slippage to token pairs critical for the growth of the Optimism ecosystem.
description: Velodrome is an AMM modeled on Solidly and designed to be a public good that provides deep liquidity and low slippage to token pairs critical for the growth of the Optimism ecosystem.

author: WOOFi
title: WOOFi
shortDescription: WOOFi is a one-stop shop with CeFi-grade execution, one-click cross-chain swaps, and single-sided institutional yield opportunities.
description: WOOFi is a one-stop shop with CeFi-grade execution, one-click cross-chain swaps, and single-sided institutional yield opportunities.

author: PoolTogether
title: PoolTogether
shortDescription: PoolTogether is a no loss prize savings protocol. The more you deposit the better your chances to win!
description: PoolTogether is a no loss prize savings protocol. The more you deposit the better your chances to win!

author: Beefy
title: Beefy
shortDescription: Beefy Finance is a Multi-Chain Yield Optimizer Protocol.
description: Beefy Finance is a Multi-Chain Yield Optimizer Protocol.

author: Stargate
title: Stargate
shortDescription: Stargate is a fully composable liquidity transport protocol that lives at the heart of Omnichain DeFi.
description: Stargate is a fully composable liquidity transport protocol that lives at the heart of Omnichain DeFi.

author: Synthetix
title: Synthetix
shortDescription: Synthetix is a system designed to let users hold and trade synthetic assets whose value can be tied to real-world assets.
description: Synthetix is a system designed to let users hold and trade synthetic assets whose value can be tied to real-world assets.

author: Arrakis
title: Arrakis
shortDescription: Arrakis is a protocol that specializes in concentrated & active liquidity management.
description: Arrakis is a protocol that specializes in concentrated & active liquidity management.

author: Aktionariat
title: Aktionariat
shortDescription: Provides Swiss Companies with digital tools to create a market for their shares on their website.
description: Provides Swiss Companies with digital tools to create a market for their shares on their website.

author: Lyra
title: Lyra
shortDescription: Lyra is an automated market maker (AMM) for options trading.
description: Lyra is an automated market maker (AMM) for options trading.

author: Thales
title: Thales
shortDescription: Allows the creation of peer-to-peer parimutuel markets that anyone can join. The foundation of novel on-chain initiatives, from AMM-based positional markets to immersive gamified experiences.
description: Allows the creation of peer-to-peer parimutuel markets that anyone can join. The foundation of novel on-chain initiatives, from AMM-based positional markets to immersive gamified experiences.

author: Optimism Bridge
title: Optimism Bridge
shortDescription: The Optimism Bridge allows you to transfer assets between L1 and Optimism.
description: The Optimism Bridge allows you to transfer assets between L1 and Optimism.

author: Curve
title: Curve
shortDescription: Creating deep on-chain liquidity using advanced bonding curves
description: Creating deep on-chain liquidity using advanced bonding curves

author: Uniswap
title: Uniswap
shortDescription: Uniswap lets you swap between assets. It is currently the most commonly used OP Mainnet application.
description: Uniswap lets you swap between assets. It is currently the most commonly used OP Mainnet application.

author: 1inch
title: 1inch
shortDescription: DeFi / DEX aggregator with the most liquidity and the best rates.
description: DeFi / DEX aggregator with the most liquidity and the best rates.

author: Aave
title: Aave
shortDescription: Aave is a decentralised non-custodial liquidity market protocol where users can participate as suppliers or borrowers. Suppliers provide liquidity to the market to earn a passive income, while borrowers are able to borrow in an overcollateralised (perpetually) or undercollateralised (one-block liquidity) fashion.
description: Aave is a decentralised non-custodial liquidity market protocol where users can participate as suppliers or borrowers. Suppliers provide liquidity to the market to earn a passive income, while borrowers are able to borrow in an overcollateralised (perpetually) or undercollateralised (one-block liquidity) fashion.
